description: Max King II is in his early 30's and once he sat down with our casting agent we knew he was the right guy for the job. Max is one big dude and he loves the gym. Max hits the gym daily and he wants to get into the industry because he is either having sex or at the gym and now he wants to be in camera. He's done a lot sexually and our casting agent gets even more information out of him after he is done stroking that nut out. I'm sure we will see him again with his epic PASS. Let us know what you think of Max King.
title: Casting Audition: Max King
